title: allow users to move their favorites to the left side of the web page
body: allow users to move their favorites to the left side of the web page

comments.body:
Favourites Pane, Flyout Pane, whatever you call it, needs to have the option to show down the left side of the screen.
It's the natural place for it to be, as has been the case on IE for the past 20 years !
Left handed users especially, need this on the left.
Please make provision for it.
